pr_title: Make 403 an allowable Pub/Sub UP status

timeline.message: Make 403 an allowable Pub/Sub UP status

timeline.bodyText:
Why did you move this section up?
Our convention is to have configuration after deps in refdoc.
timeline.author: meltsufin

replies.bodyText: I'll move it back. My thought was that configuration is really long for pubsub, and this needed to be more prominent, but maybe not.
replies.author: elefeint

timeline.message: moved actuator section back in adoc; fixed checkstyle
